document_title: Granulomatous pharyngitis: Causes, signs, prevention and treatment
subsection_content:
1. Does pharyngitis go away on its own?
Granulomatous pharyngitis cannot go away on its own. Therefore, patients need to see an ENT specialist to receive proper and complete treatment to avoid recurrence that affects their health and life.
2. Can pharyngitis be cured?
Granulomatous pharyngitis can be completely cured with appropriate treatment. The earlier the disease is detected and treated, the higher the chance of a complete cure.
